formalpara.title: Figure 10. Effector-binding region of human vs. C. elegans Rho family members.
formalpara.para: The entire effector-binding region of human and C. elegans proteins was aligned. The core sequence, thought to govern direct protein-protein interactions, is underlined. Core residues not conserved in the subfamily are bolded and blue. Human orthologs are listed above C. elegans orthologs. C. elegans protein names have a dash and number. Some human proteins have alternate names (see Table 1).
